Package othello

Class Grid

java.lang.Object
othello.Grid
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Grid extends Object implements Serializable
othello.Grid class: This is where the grid will be stored alongside all the methods that will modify or access all the grid's cells.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    Field

    int
    blackDepth

    Indicates the cell where the cursor is currently placed

    emoji
    Parameter that dictates if the game will display emojis or letters false = letters; true = emojis

    input
    Parameter that dictates if the game will ask player's moves with coordinates or keyboard (z; q; s; d; e) false = keyboard; true = coordinates

    • countCell

      public int countCell(CellState state)
      Counts the number of times the specified symbol occurs. Can be used as a score counter
      Parameters:
      state - A char that specifies the symbol to search for
      Returns:
      An int with the number of occurrences of the symbol

    • wouldFlip

      public boolean wouldFlip(GameState player, int y, int x, int dir)
      Check whether this move would result in any flips in this direction.
      Parameters:
      player - the current player who is making this move
      y - the row number of the move square
      x - the column of the move square
      dir - the direction that we are checking
      Returns:
      returns true if it would flip, false if it wouldn't.

    • makeFlip

      public void makeFlip(GameState player, int y, int x, int dir)
      Make any flips in the given direction (0 to 8)
      Parameters:
      player - the current player who is making this move
      y - the row number of the move square
      x - the column of the move square
      dir - the direction that we are checking

    • makeMove

      public void makeMove(GameState player, int y, int x)
      Tests if the given coordinates are playable, if yes: Plays the move Looks in all 9 directions for cells that need to be flipped

    • applyMoveCloning

      public Grid applyMoveCloning(Cell move, Grid temp, GameState colour)
      Apply the move in a copied board.
      Parameters:
      move - the cell we want to play
      temp - the copied board
      colour - player color
      Returns:
      a new grid with the move done.
